text: aur hum ne madyan ki taraf un ke bhai Shoib (alaihissalaam) ko bheja, unhone farmaaya aye meri khaum! tum Allah ki ibaadath karo, us ke siva koyi tumhaara maboodh nahi, tumhaare paas tumhaare parvardigaar ki taraf se waaze daleel aa chuki hai, pas tum naap aur tol pura pura kiya karo aur logo ko un ki chize kam kar ke math do aur roye zameen mein, us ke baadh ke us ki durusti kardi gayi, fasaadh math phailaao, ye tumhaare liye naafe hai agar tum tasdeeq karo
